sections.title: Choose Your Program
sections.description: Select the program that fits your needs

cards.title: 14-Day Nutrition Intensive
cards.subtitle: Starts at $425 for someone wanting answers now without a long commitment.
cards.description: Real nutritional insight goes a very long way and this the first step in your Fine Diet journey. During our 60-75 minute virtual session we'll review your completed intake forms in depth including: symptom history, foundational imbalances and your food and lifestyle rhythms — to help you gain clarity around what your body may be asking for.

cards.title: 12-Week Gut Reset
cards.subtitle: Starts at $1,245 for someone ready for deeper root-cause work + long-term change.
cards.description: A comprehensive 12-week program that helps you reset your metabolism and build lasting habits. Work with our team to identify and address foundational imbalances, improve energy levels, and develop sustainable nutrition strategies.

categories.label: Resources
categories.headline: Made for less dieting, more transformation.
categories.subtitle: The Fine Diet Method™ is a 12-week nutritional transformation for women ready to reduce inflammation, reclaim energy and reset their relationship with food.
